{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# HXutility"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Run heat exchanger by temperature:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "HXutility: hx\n",
      "ins...\n",
      "[0] feed\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow (kmol/hr): Water    200\n",
      "                    Ethanol  200\n",
      "outs...\n",
      "[0] product\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 323.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow (kmol/hr): Water    200\n",
      "                    Ethanol  200\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "from biosteam.units import HXutility\n",
    "from thermosteam import Chemicals, Stream, settings\n",
    "\n",
    "chemicals = Chemicals(['Water', 'Ethanol'])\n",
    "settings.set_thermo(chemicals)\n",
    "\n",
    "# Simulate heat exchanger\n",
    "feed = Stream('feed', Water=200, Ethanol=200)\n",
    "hx = HXutility('hx', ins=feed, outs='product', T=50+273.15,\n",
    "               rigorous=False) # Ignore VLE\n",
    "hx.simulate()\n",
    "\n",
    "# Show results\n",
    "hx"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>Heat Exchanger</th>\n",
       "      <th>Units</th>\n",
       "      <th>hx</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"2\" valign=\"top\">Power</th>\n",
       "      <th>Rate</th>\n",
       "      <td>kW</td>\n",
       "      <td>0</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Cost</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>0</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"3\" valign=\"top\">Low pressure steam</th>\n",
       "      <th>Duty</th>\n",
       "      <td>kJ/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.01e+06</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Flow</th>\n",
       "      <td>kmol/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>26.1</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Cost</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>6.21</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"7\" valign=\"top\">Design</th>\n",
       "      <th>Area</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft^2</td>\n",
       "      <td>57.4</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Overall heat transfer coefficient</th>\n",
       "      <td>kW/m^2/K</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.5</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Fouling correction factor</th>\n",
       "      <td></td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Tube side pressure drop</th>\n",
       "      <td>psi</td>\n",
       "      <td>5</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Shell side pressure drop</th>\n",
       "      <td>psi</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.5</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Operating pressure</th>\n",
       "      <td>psi</td>\n",
       "      <td>50</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Total tube length</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft</td>\n",
       "      <td>20</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Purchase cost</th>\n",
       "      <th>Heat exchanger</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>4.75e+03</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Total purchase cost</th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>4.75e+03</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Utility cost</th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>6.21</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "Heat Exchanger                                            Units       hx\n",
       "Power               Rate                                     kW        0\n",
       "                    Cost                                 USD/hr        0\n",
       "Low pressure steam  Duty                                  kJ/hr 1.01e+06\n",
       "                    Flow                                kmol/hr     26.1\n",
       "                    Cost                                 USD/hr     6.21\n",
       "Design              Area                                   ft^2     57.4\n",
       "                    Overall heat transfer coefficient  kW/m^2/K      0.5\n",
       "                    Fouling correction factor                          1\n",
       "                    Tube side pressure drop                 psi        5\n",
       "                    Shell side pressure drop                psi      1.5\n",
       "                    Operating pressure                      psi       50\n",
       "                    Total tube length                        ft       20\n",
       "Purchase cost       Heat exchanger                          USD 4.75e+03\n",
       "Total purchase cost                                         USD 4.75e+03\n",
       "Utility cost                                             USD/hr     6.21"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 2,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "hx.results()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Run heat exchanger by vapor fraction:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "HXutility: hx\n",
      "ins...\n",
      "[0] feed\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow (kmol/hr): Water    200\n",
      "                    Ethanol  200\n",
      "outs...\n",
      "[0] product\n",
      "    phases: ('g', 'l'), T: 357.45 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow (kmol/hr): (g) Water    200\n",
      "                        Ethanol  200\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "# Simulate heat exchanger\n",
    "feed = Stream('feed', Water=200, Ethanol=200)\n",
    "hx = HXutility('hx', ins=feed, outs='product', V=1,\n",
    "               rigorous=True) # Include VLE\n",
    "hx.simulate()\n",
    "hx"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>Heat Exchanger</th>\n",
       "      <th>Units</th>\n",
       "      <th>hx</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"2\" valign=\"top\">Power</th>\n",
       "      <th>Rate</th>\n",
       "      <td>kW</td>\n",
       "      <td>0</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Cost</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>0</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"3\" valign=\"top\">Low pressure steam</th>\n",
       "      <th>Duty</th>\n",
       "      <td>kJ/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.07e+07</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Flow</th>\n",
       "      <td>kmol/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>532</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Cost</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>126</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"7\" valign=\"top\">Design</th>\n",
       "      <th>Area</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft^2</td>\n",
       "      <td>733</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Overall heat transfer coefficient</th>\n",
       "      <td>kW/m^2/K</td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Fouling correction factor</th>\n",
       "      <td></td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Tube side pressure drop</th>\n",
       "      <td>psi</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.5</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Shell side pressure drop</th>\n",
       "      <td>psi</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.5</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Operating pressure</th>\n",
       "      <td>psi</td>\n",
       "      <td>50</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Total tube length</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft</td>\n",
       "      <td>20</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Purchase cost</th>\n",
       "      <th>Heat exchanger</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.67e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Total purchase cost</th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.67e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Utility cost</th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>126</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "Heat Exchanger                                            Units       hx\n",
       "Power               Rate                                     kW        0\n",
       "                    Cost                                 USD/hr        0\n",
       "Low pressure steam  Duty                                  kJ/hr 2.07e+07\n",
       "                    Flow                                kmol/hr      532\n",
       "                    Cost                                 USD/hr      126\n",
       "Design              Area                                   ft^2      733\n",

       "                    Fouling correction factor                          1\n",
       "                    Tube side pressure drop                 psi      1.5\n",
       "                    Shell side pressure drop                psi      1.5\n",
       "                    Operating pressure                      psi       50\n",
       "                    Total tube length                        ft       20\n",
       "Purchase cost       Heat exchanger                          USD 2.67e+04\n",
       "Total purchase cost                                         USD 2.67e+04\n",
       "Utility cost                                             USD/hr      126"
      ]
